Ensuring that the initiatives proposed in Sidon do not negatively impact the environment would require a sustainable approach that considers the city's unique environmental context. Here are some ways to achieve this:

1. Conduct an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA): An EIA will help identify the environmental issues that may arise from implementing the initiatives proposed in Sidon. Based on the assessment's outcomes, appropriate measures can be put in place to reduce any adverse effects of the initiative.

2. Develop a Sustainable Development Plan (SDP): A sustainable development plan involves developing initiatives' key component that responds to the identified environmental issues. This plan will include policies, strategies, and actions that promote sustainable practices towards reducing adverse effect on the environment and meeting environmentally sensitive criteria.

3. Promote Green Practices: Promoting green practices throughout the initiative boardering from sustainability in transportation, waste management, construction to encouraging the use of renewable energy sources. By incorporating these practices, the initiatives' overall environmental impact is reduced.

4. Develop Green Spaces: Developing green spaces provides a platform environmental corridors and greenbelts can be created, which help in reducing air pollution in the urban landscape. Green spaces have been proven to improve the quality of life for city inhabitants, and they provide habitat for flora and fauna.

5. Incorporate Technology into Sustainable Initiatives: Technology can help in the implementation of sustainable initiatives that maintain the environmental standards. Innovative practices such as utilizing improved irrigation systems, prioritizing LED lighting systems, and introducing energy-efficient systems provide solutions to large-scale initiatives.

By taking a sustainable approach that considers environmental best practices, the implementation of initiatives in Sidon will minimize harm to the environment while contributing positively to the development of the city.
